name: Pageup
description: Pageup believe in the power of teamwork and innovation. We’re passionate about helping organisations build, develop and retain high-performing teams with great tech. With our industry-leading software and unbeatable customer support, you’ll have everything you need to hire the best people, faster. Customers love PageUp for its deep functionality, world-class support and ability to be configured for a range of workflows and industries.
features: All-inclusive support with awesome customer service
Technology you’ll love to use now and in the future.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: HR tech done differently
ShortDescription: All your hiring needs in one place Recruit, develop and retain high performing teams with PageUp

Highlights.name: Recruitment Marketing
Highlights.description: Automate an exceptional candidate experience to build high quality talent pipelines.

Highlights.name: Applicant Tracking System
Highlights.description: Improve efficiency and effectiveness of recruitment to deliver ROI.

Highlights.name: Onboarding
Highlights.description: Automated tasks and workflows ensure compliance and speed to competency.

enhanced_description: PageUp offers industry-leading HR technology designed to help organizations build, develop, and retain high-performing teams. The platform provides deep functionality for all hiring needs, including Recruitment Marketing for building quality talent pipelines, an Applicant Tracking System (ATS) to improve recruitment efficiency and deliver ROI, and Onboarding with automated tasks and workflows to ensure compliance and speed to competency. PageUp aims to boost Hiring Manager confidence and productivity with its configurable software, backed by guaranteed on-time, on-budget implementation and world-class, all-inclusive customer support.
key_use_cases: Building, developing, and retaining high-performing teams
Automating candidate experience and building high-quality talent pipelines
Improving recruitment efficiency and effectiveness to deliver ROI
Ensuring compliance and accelerating speed to competency during onboarding
Boosting Hiring Manager confidence and productivity
competitive_advantages: Deep functionality across recruiting and talent management
Configurable for a range of workflows and industries
implementation_scenarios: Managed implementation with guaranteed on-time and on-budget delivery
roi_benefits: Increased Hiring Manager productivity and confidence
compliance_features: Automated tasks and workflows for compliance during onboarding
scalability_features: Designed for Small, Large, and Global Enterprise companies
Configurable for a range of workflows and industries
